name: LuaDialog
description: Lua dialog class. This class is used to create dialogs and manupilate it from lua. There are five types of dialogs. DIALOG_TYPE_NORMAL DIALOG_TYPE_PROGRESS DIALOG_TYPE_PROGRESS_INDETERMINATE DIALOG_TYPE_DATEPICKER DIALOG_TYPE_TIMEPICKER

functions.name: messageBox
functions.description: Shows a messagebox

functions.name: messageBoxInternal
functions.description: Shows a messagebox

functions.name: create
functions.description: Creates LuaDialog for build

functions.name: setPositiveButton
functions.description: Sets the positive button of LuaDialog

functions.name: setPositiveButtonInternal
functions.description: Sets the positive button of LuaDialog

functions.name: setNegativeButton
functions.description: Sets the negative button of LuaDialog

functions.name: setNegativeButtonInternal
functions.description: Sets the negative button of LuaDialog

functions.name: setTitle
functions.description: Sets the title of the LuaDialog

functions.name: setTitleRef
functions.description: Sets the title of the LuaDialog

functions.name: setMessage
functions.description: Sets the message of the LuaDialog

functions.name: setMessage
functions.description: Sets the message of the LuaDialog

functions.name: setProgress
functions.description: Sets the value of the progress bar (progress bar is needed otherwise it wont effect anything)

functions.name: setMax
functions.description: Sets the maximum value of the progress bar (progress bar is needed otherwise it wont effect anything)

functions.name: setDate
functions.description: Sets the date of the date picker (date picker dialog is needed otherwise it wort effect anything)

functions.name: setDateManual
functions.description: Sets the date of the date picker (date picker dialog is needed otherwise it wort effect anything)

functions.name: setTime
functions.description: Sets the time of the time picker (time picker dialog is needed otherwise it wort effect anything)

functions.name: setTimeManual
functions.description: Sets the time of the time picker (time picker dialog is needed otherwise it wort effect anything)

functions.name: show
functions.description: Shows the created dialog of LuaDialog

functions.name: dismiss
functions.description: Dismiss the created dialog

functions.name: setDateSelectedListener
functions.description: Sets combo changed listener

parameters.name: lt
parameters.type: fun(datePicker: LuaDialog, context: LuaContext, day: number, month: number, year: number):void

functions.name: setTimeSelectedListener
functions.description: Sets combo changed listener

parameters.name: lt
parameters.type: fun(timePicker: LuaDialog, context: LuaContext, hour: number, minute: number):void
